House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07836
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING SOCIO-ECONOMIC ACTIVITY AND REGIONAL CONNECTIVITY BY RATIONALIZING THE LOCAL ROAD NETWORK SYSTEM
ABSTRACT : Recognizes the importance of investing in local roads and directs attention to the critical role of local government units (LGUs) in rationalizing the local road network; Provides for a weighing system that shall identify a more streamlined classification of local roads, transferring the jurisdiction of low priority roads to municipalities and high priority ones to the provincial level.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
